case_name: Mehrzad Zarei v. The Association of Families of Flight PS752 Victims
legal_issues: Remedies under Canada Not-For-Profit Corporations Act
outcome_details: The Application was dismissed. The Association was awarded costs, with enforcement of the cost order stayed until the plaintiff collects any money from the government of Iran.
decision_factors: Reasonable expectation under Canada Not-For-Profit Corporations Act
Impact of downing of flight on Plaintiff
Association's cost request on abandonment of application
summary: Mehrzad Zarei's application against the Association was dismissed. Costs were awarded to the Association, with enforcement stayed pending receipt of funds from Iran by Mehrzad.
